title: Shame you Flipkart...
selftext:
I can't believe how they allow it, every shoe on sale are costlier than the marked price except size 10, 11 shoes 

For once i thought about buying shoes from online; never again...
comments:
Well, first of all it has nothing to do with Flipkart. The prices are marked by the sellers. 

Secondly, even the brand stores themselves have different pricing for different sizes and colours. 

During sales, only the unsold and not so common sizes (and sometimes weird colours) of that particular shoes are sold at great discounts. Why would anyone sell any product for a discount, if it’s demand is ever increasing?
Supply and demand nhi padha kya Bhai kabhi

Flipkart is displaying the discount price, even in the product page, at least tell me that it's for xl. 

Anyway lesson learnt.
